turns.content: Summarize Octavia Butler's Parable of the Sower in a poem.

In a world gone awry
Where the earth is dry
And the future is nigh
There is one who dares to defy

Lauren Olamina, a young black girl
With a vision that unfurls
A new way to save the world
From the greed and hate that twirl

She has a power, a unique gift
To feel the pain of others, to lift
Their burdens and heal their rift
A parable of the sower, a new myth

She travels north to escape the fray
But danger lurks at every bay
The world is harsh, the rules unfair
But Lauren perseveres, with love and care

She builds a community, a safe haven
Where all are welcome, no matter the color or station
In this new world, they work and thrive
A beacon of hope, a new way to survive

Lauren's message spreads far and wide
A call to action, a way to collide
With the past and make a new start
A parable of the sower, a work of art
